FilterItemPortable.Name: Analisar
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">(((GN_PESSOAS.EHCLIENTE = 'S') OR (GN_PESSOAS.EHFORNECEDOR = 'S')) AND ( GN_PESSOAS.STATUS = 2 ) AND ( GN_PESSOAS.GRUPODEASSINATURAS IN ( SELECT C.HANDLE FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES B, CP_GRUPOALCADAS C WHERE B.GRUPO = C.HANDLE AND ( ( C.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA ) OR ( C.EHHIERARQUIA <> 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA ) ) AND B.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND B.ATIVO = 'S' ) OR GN_PESSOAS.GRUPODEASSINATURAS IN ( SELECT D.GRUPO FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASUSUARIOS D, CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES I, CP_GRUPOALCADAS G WHERE D.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.HANDLE = D.INTEGRANTE AND ( ( G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND I.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA ) OR ( G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'N' AND I.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA ) ) AND D.USUARIOAUTORIZADO = @USUARIO AND I.USUARIO = D.USUARIO AND D.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.AUSENTE = 'S' ) ) )</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>(((GN_PESSOAS.EHCLIENTE = 'S') OR (GN_PESSOAS.EHFORNECEDOR = 'S')) AND ( GN_PESSOAS.STATUS = 2 ) AND ( GN_PESSOAS.GRUPODEASSINATURAS IN ( SELECT C.HANDLE FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES B, CP_GRUPOALCADAS C WHERE B.GRUPO = C.HANDLE AND ( ( C.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA ) OR ( C.EHHIERARQUIA <> 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA ) ) AND B.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND B.ATIVO = 'S' ) OR GN_PESSOAS.GRUPODEASSINATURAS IN ( SELECT D.GRUPO FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASUSUARIOS D, CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES I, CP_GRUPOALCADAS G WHERE D.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.HANDLE = D.INTEGRANTE AND ( ( G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND I.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA ) OR ( G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'N' AND I.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA ) ) AND D.USUARIOAUTORIZADO = @USUARIO AND I.USUARIO = D.USUARIO AND D.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.AUSENTE = 'S' ) ) )</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Aprovados
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="EHCLIENTE"> <FieldDefinitionName>BooleanFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="EHFORNECEDOR"> <FieldDefinitionName>BooleanFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="3" FieldName="STATUS"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ListItem"> <Value>4</Value> <Text>Aprovado</Text> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>A.EHCLIENTE = :1__EHCLIENTE OR A.EHFORNECEDOR = :2__EHFORNECEDOR AND A.STATUS = :3__STATUS</Where> <Parameters> <Parameter> <Name>1__EHCLIENTE</Name> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">S</Value> <Direction>Input</Direction> <DataType>String</DataType> <Precision>0</Precision> <Scale>0</Scale> <Size>0</Size> </Parameter> <Parameter> <Name>2__EHFORNECEDOR</Name> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">S</Value> <Direction>Input</Direction> <DataType>String</DataType> <Precision>0</Precision> <Scale>0</Scale> <Size>0</Size> </Parameter> <Parameter> <Name>3__STATUS</Name> <Value xsi:type="xsd:int">4</Value> <Direction>Input</Direction> <DataType>Integer</DataType> <Precision>0</Precision> <Scale>0</Scale> <Size>0</Size> </Parameter> </Parameters> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="NOME"> <FieldDefinitionName>StringFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>contém</Name> <DatabaseOperator>LIKE</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> <ValueSubstitutionPattern>%{0}%</ValueSubstitutionPattern> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string"></Value> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="TIPOCRM"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="3" FieldName="EMAIL"> <FieldDefinitionName>StringFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>contém</Name> <DatabaseOperator>LIKE</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> <ValueSubstitutionPattern>%{0}%</ValueSubstitutionPattern> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string"></Value> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
